DOC.brief_summary: At present first option induce ovulation polycystic ovary syndrome anovulatory infertility clomiphene citrate ( CC ) metformin . Notwithstanding effectiveness CC metformin alone sequential combined regimen , percentage patient range 5 % 30 % remain anovulatory . For patient , use gonadotropin control ovarian stimulation ( COS ) indicate . Moreover , date n't clear COS follow timed intercourse ( TI ) intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) . The aim present study compare TI IUI infertile PCOS patient undergo COS term cost-benefit .
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Ovarian Stimulation Followed Timed Intercourse Intrauterine Insemination Infertile PCOS Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Infertile PCOS patient remain anovulatory CC metformin treatment enrol . All patient receive gonadotropin low-dose step-up protocol COS , randomize receive three trial TI ( group A ) IUI ( group B ) . All patient eligible undergo baseline assessment consist anthropometric , hormonal , ultrasonographic evaluation . In patient COS obtain use highly purify urinary FSH low-dose step-up protocol , TI IUI perform 35 hour ovulation induction human chorionic gonadotropin . During study , clinical reproductive outcome , adverse experience evaluate patient . Data analyze use intention-to-treat principle P value 0.05 less consider significant . Continuous variable analyze unpaired test general linear model repeat measure analysis Bonferroni test post-hoc analysis require . For categorical variable , Pearson chi-square Fisher 's exact test use . Cumulative pregnancy rate , primary end-point , calculate Kaplan-Maier method , difference two group assess log-rank test . Cox proportional-hazards model use calculate hazard ratio new pregnancy group .
DOC.criteria: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( use NIH criterion ) Anovulatory infertility ( use WHO criterion ) Age < 18 > 35 year Severe obesity ( BMI > 35 ) Neoplastic , metabolic , hepatic , cardiovascular disorder concurrent medical illness Hypothyroidism , hyperprolactinemia , Cushing 's syndrome , nonclassical congenital adrenal hyperplasia Current previous ( within last six month ) use oral contraceptive , glucocorticoid , antiandrogens , antiobesity drug , hormonal drug Intention start diet specific program physical activity Organic pelvic diseases Previous pelvic surgery Suspected peritoneal factor infertility Tubal male factor infertility subfertility
